TopicTitle: [Old, terrible, and bad] Gregrox Inc. Asteroid Expansion 0.1

Articles.Content:
EDIT: 9/26/2016

This was an old terrible planet mod done in the dark ages of planet modding when the planet modding plugin was bad and I was worse. This was from a time over two years ago when I thought the important part about modding was "being a modder" rather than "making mods." This mod is badly written, buggy, terrible, boring, and needs to be forgotten along with everything else I did in 2014.

 

Spoiler

 

Thanks to Planet Factory CE (PFCE), Gregrox Incorperated is now able to make an expansion! Using height-maps straight from Space Engine, I bring you version 0.1 of the Asteroid expansion. It places a plethora of small and some larger celestial bodies near the orbit of Dres. First up is a simple modification of Plantar and Moonar, changed to be a large dwarf planet and tiny moon. To install, simply install PFCE and place the GregroxInc folder in \GameData\PlanetFactory\PluginData\PlanetFactory

This is, in fact, my very first mod, and feedback is much appreciated. Right now there is an odd glitch with the scaled spaces, and you might get the hell kraken if you PlanetPick Moonar. to fix the default and wonky textures on Plantar and Moonar respectively, reload the cfg and scaledspace. Here's a pic of Plantar's orbit.

Download (Mediafire)

But.. That... Looked awesome! A mun that looks like a ball of wire...

In the early planetfactory days i made a b$$$load of asteroids based on gilly and minmus in a belt between duna and jool(30-50asteroids). It ended up looking ok by randomizing the arguement of apoapsis and changing the inclination and anomaly a bit but the mapview looked very messy. Maybe the orbit colors can be made to a less visible color to reduce the mess in the mapview.

Nice work Greg going to try it out now

Edit: Problem I was having but I fixed it: http://imgur.com/a/UXQgE

Moonar wasn't meant to look exactly like Gilly, Plantar wasn't meant to look anything like Tylo. It is a brown planet with bright craters.
I don't have the computer I was working on right now, I'll work on it some more later.
